description: Try our easy to follow Bruschetta with Avocado, Hummus & Zucchini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Bruschetta with Avocado, Hummus & Zucchini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spray each side of the bread with olive oil. Toast the bread on preheated chargrill pan on each side until toasted, spread with avocado hummus and top with zucchini. Tip 1: Avocado hummus is great served with sliced vegetables as a dip. Tip 2: Spread the avocado hummus over wraps for school lunch boxes. Tip 3: Avocado hummus is best eaten within 1 day of making, store, covered closely with plastic wrap in a jar in the fridge.
